Scripts.OnLClick: local show_list = { "13297", "29889", "cbDimond", "lbBuyTime", "ckbTiime1", "ckbTiime2", "ckbTiime3", "lbBuytime1", "lbBuytime2", "lbBuyTime3", } local hide_list = { "lbBuyItem", "btItemBuyImg", "1669", "lbItemBuyName", "lbSaveMoney", "edbSaveMoney", "47859", "lbMoney", --[[ "lbAllGold", "edbBuyG", "lbAllAg", "edbBuyA", "lbAllCu", "edbBuyC", ]] } local move_list = { ["lbAllGold"] = {49,-300}, ["edbBuyG"] = {75,-300}, ["lbAllAg"] = {137,-300}, ["edbBuyA"] = {163,-300}, ["lbAllCu"] = {195,-300}, ["edbBuyC"] = {221,-300}, } for _, name in ipairs(show_list) do uiGetglobal("layWorld.frBuyAll.fmBuy."..name):Show(); end for _, name in ipairs(hide_list) do uiGetglobal("layWorld.frBuyAll.fmBuy."..name):Hide(); end for name, pos in pairs(move_list) do uiGetglobal("layWorld.frBuyAll.fmBuy."..name):MoveTo(pos[1], pos[2]); end
